message: Daniel Starkey enters the Games-as-Art debate with "Amazing," the piece that earned him his Destructoid internship. http://tehpwngaming.com/index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=145%3Aamazing&catid=47%3Alast-added-tutorilas&Itemid=56
Related and depressing: Rather one-sided debate on Fox News about federal grants for independent game developers as a part of the arts: http://www.liveleak.com/view?i=e80_1305997846
Not to inject too much political commentary, but really, with fox, that's par for the course.
Definitely gotta love how they keep playing violent scenes from CoD on the side while he's talking about educational games.

im glad they brought on some random asshole to talk about government spending...might as well just cut any funding related to education and the arts...but that military spending better stay the same or we're all fucking dead! (the "terrorists" will get us)
